entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:51 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 02:47 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
